page.title: 06DANCING
page.content:
Lots of people like to break dance.Floor work is done on lino if you have got any.There are lots of moves that you can do on the floor.Here are some of them,spinning on your back,giro also known as windmill or helicopter,hand spin,turtle,crazy legs and spinning on your head.Nike clothes are the most popular break dancing clothes.you do body poping by freezing your joints and locking your body.there are lots of break dance films here are some of them,Beat Street,Electric Boogaloo,Break Dance the movie and Break Dance you can do it.The best crew in Britain are called Broken Glass.
{
